storyInfo:
With Ch'en diverting attention, Lin Yühsia successfully rescues the hostages on the ship.
Elsewhere, just as Ch'en finds herself with nowhere to run, Lin Yühsia comes to her rescue on a boat. And the ship explodes.

attributes.content: Status?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Going well. I'm almost to the dining room.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: We meet again, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You should have stayed in bed.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I wish I could've done that. I also wish that, when I opened my eyes again, all of this would've been over, win or lose.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Too bad. I couldn't.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You can't beat me.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I'm really glad that I identified you two as my greatest foes right at the beginning... We wouldn't have made it this far otherwise.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You... You don't seem like those maniacs out there. Why are you doing this?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Let me tell you how I truly feel, now that it's come to this.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Ms. Candela once said that her father, a former mayor of this city, was a useless piece of trash who, propped up by the Leithanian government, could do nothing but take bribes.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Before the outraged citizens could kick his office's door in, he fled the country with his wife and daughter.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Although her father was a piece of trash through and through, as the daughter of the scumbag, she followed her father first to Kazimierz, then to Victoria.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Through her father, she learned all the ways that wealth could be used. She learned the very meaning of wealth.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Then, she came back to the city and became its mayor.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: At a time when the resistance was nothing but a huge failure, the city found itself producing the finest liquor, coffee, and confectionaries.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Dossoles tequila can even be found in Leithanien and Columbia.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And while the Leithanians and Columbians were bickering at each other, the city transformed into a vacation hotspot of choice among the elite of both sides.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: They had no choice but to follow Ms. Candela's rule: You may never fight here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And it's not military might or prowess that makes them willingly follow this rule. It's wealth, entertainment, and all the luxuries this place has to offer.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It's the city's colorful facade.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I know that's not how I should see all this.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But I can't keep myself from thinking this way—
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: From a certain point of view, and all things considered, perhaps Ms. Candela loves this country far more than my father.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: All he is doing is blindly chasing this construct of a country. He wants a country called Bolívar.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Its borders were defined when it was still a colony. Its citizens are those who have always lived on these lands.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What comes next? How will this country take on the Columbians and Leithanians in this conflict? How will it continue to develop as a country?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: He doesn't know. He doesn't actually know what kind of a country Bolívar is.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But Ms. Candela found a path forward. She found meaning in its existence, and she plans to make that meaning a reality.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's a load of shit.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: It's better than having nothing but empty promises, no?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In that case, why help your father?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: From the moment I was born, I've watched my father toil away amid the flames of war. I've watched him go from a spirited man to a quiet one.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I know what kind of person my father is. He's not like those men who chose to give in to the modern world.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Even though working under Ms. Candela put these thoughts in my head, that doesn't mean I will betray my father.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But I also cannot deny that these thoughts are getting stronger and stronger. So much that I'm slowly starting to consider the other possibilities there are.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's why this operation is something like a crossroads for me.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I will wholeheartedly help my father in his cause. If he succeeds, then I will continue to help him.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If he fails, then I will accept my change of heart and become Ms. Candela's supporter.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Of course, if I die—
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That just means I'm gonna be dead, haha.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But now is not the time for all of this to end. Not just yet.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's why I can't let you through.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In that case... we've got nothing to say to each other.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Right, it's been a pleasure, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If we'd met under any other circumstance, I would have loved to give you and Miss Lin a proper tour of the city.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'll pass.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I thought you'd say that.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: B Team, send a few men my way.
attributes.name: Ship Guard

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Dim-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: You know that team that did really well in the championship, LUNG wRATh? Seems like their girl Ch'en is still putting up a fight.
attributes.name: Quick-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: The whole ship's our people, and all the other contestants are here. How is she putting up a fight?
attributes.name: Dim-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: Apparently she took Ernesto out.
attributes.name: Quick-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: Then she's been running up and down the ship, and now the captain's personally going after her.
attributes.name: Quick-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: Heh, that's something, and here I brushed it off when Ernesto told us not to underestimate them.
attributes.name: Quick-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: Hm? Speaking of, where's the other girl, Lin?
attributes.name: Dim-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: I don't see her among the hostages.
attributes.name: Dim-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: Who knows. Probably jumped off the ship.
attributes.name: Quick-witted Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: You called?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia leaps down from the ceiling above, swiftly dispatching them with two quick chops.
Quick! Surround her!
attributes.name: Alert Pancho Subordinate

attributes.content: (Hui-chieh makes good distractions. There's not too many of them here.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Let's get this over with quickly.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.text: Surrounded by the guards in the room, Lin Yühsia leans forward slightly and dashes.
She rams her knee into the first guard

The third guard is about to attack with his weapon, but then notices the two streams of blood gushing out of his arm. He screams and falls to his knees, before a single chop turns everything around him black.
The fourth and fifth guards attempt to attack her together, only for Lin Yühsia to kick an entire dining table toward them, tableware included. They crash to the ground before they can react.

Correctly deducing the severity of the situation, the sixth man picks up his comms in an attempt to relay the information, only to find it puffing up smoke. The next moment, he finds himself flying through the air; his body draws an elegant arc before falling into the sea.
Lin Yühsia is particularly skilled in close quarters combat, and she takes full advantage of this in the cramped dining room, dispatching the hostage guards in a flash.
The hostages, in other words the dignitaries kidnapped by the captain and the contestants who got dragged into the mess, are all trembling in the corner, gawking at her in surprise.

attributes.content: Come with me if you want to live.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: How are we supposed to escape?! The whole ship's full of Pancho's men!
attributes.name: Dignitary

attributes.content: You two.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Eeep—
attributes.name: Feeble-minded Contestant

attributes.content: Stop embarrassing yourself. Stand up.
attributes.name: Headstrong Contestant

attributes.content: Miss Lin, we'll do what you say.
attributes.name: Headstrong Contestant

attributes.content: I'll be the point guard. The rest of you, take care of the bigwigs.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Headstrong Contestant

attributes.content: Now, then...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Damn... am I too late...?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Ernesto said you'd be here. Looks like he was right.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: (Ernesto... Hui-chieh took him out, but he figured the situation right after he came to?)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (He's a capable man. What a shame.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Still, I didn't expect to run into this little girl again.)
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Little girl, you shouldn't have thrown yourself into this mess.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: My name is Rafaela. I'm not a little girl.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: I may be adopted, but I'm Papa's daughter, so this is exactly the mess I should be in.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Mi hermano called you a good person. Why are you standing in our way?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Do you think what you're doing is right?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm not so sure, but Hermano and Papa said the city's a bad place, and I take their word for it.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: You should form your own opinions, little girl. Sometimes, your elders need your help.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: They have experience, and they can be quite insistent on following that experience.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: When it comes time for you to take over, you can't always do as they did in the past.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You need to use your own reason to break away from their old ways. You need to think about what only you can do.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: It's okay, but you should try to remember this.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Okay, I still have something else to take care of, so it's time for you to be good and go to bed now, little girl.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Grr, how dare that Lin Yühsia hang up on me. Now I can't reach her. What the hell is she doing?!)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia, what are you even doing? I heard you rescued the hostages like twenty minutes ago, and now most of their men are coming after you.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I know. I'm not with the hostages right now. My guess is they've gotten out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What are you...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Trust me. Come to the basement. Together, we'll...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Ch'en puts her phone down and turns around in an instant. Pancho and his men are standing not too far away.
I've heard stories of what an impressive man the Chief of Lungmen Wei Yenwu is.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: You may be no less formidable, but neither of you have a clear head, and he sent you two nonetheless.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Looks like Wei Yenwu is no more impressive than Candela.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You people see nothing but money. There is nothing but leisure on your mind. I can't wait to slaughter all of you.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I don't know what Lungmen is like, but ever since I was born, there's been blood gushing out of Bolívar's veins.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Who doesn't want to shake hands and live in happiness? But none of us here can do that.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Let me tell you this. It doesn't matter how much blood we spill. This city sucks far more blood in a single day!
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Alright, I've had enough of your games.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Give it up, or this is where you die.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: (Why are you doing this? Do you really think this is right, in spite of how much more blood you'll spill?)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (None of those questions matter to him...)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (In his eyes, I'm the one who's disrupting his plans, and besides—)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (I can't argue with him.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (Not because I regret what I've done.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (In fact, it's because I do agree with him, now that I understand his motives.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (Even if I disagree with his methods.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (But I don't understand Bolívar well enough, and I don't understand war well enough. I can't come up with a better solution.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (That's why I can't argue with him.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (That's why I can't draw my blade.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (Chi Xiao definitely won't accept me as I am now. I can tell.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (In that case, there's only one thing I can do—)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ch'en slowly lifts her gun.
So you have chosen death.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Likewise, Pancho slowly lifts the anchor in his hands.
Right at that moment—
Jump, Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.text: With no time to think, Ch

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia is waiting underneath with a boat.
Gah, after them!
attributes.name: Pancho
